alert.note: Alert for Frenchman Basin; Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 8:01PM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...The Red Flag Warning For Monday Evening will expire at 8pm CT... .A Red Flag Warning Remains in Effect for Wednesday from noon CT until 8 PM CT. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... * Affected Area...In NEZ209...Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin. In NEZ210...Fire Weather Zone 210 Frenchman Basin. In NEZ219...Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * Winds...Northwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Impacts...Weather conditions could become favorable for rapid fire growth and erratic fire behavior. Fires may quickly become out of control. Stray lightning strikes may have the potential to start fires this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Frenchman Basin; Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin
